function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate vector control measures leading to the maintenance of robust disease transmission","Impact":"Continued spread of vector-borne diseases leading to public health risks","Mitigation":"Implementing comprehensive vector control strategies tailored to local conditions and needs","Technologies":"Insecticide-treated bed nets, indoor residual spraying, environmental management","People":"Population in areas with high vector-borne disease transmission","Owner":"Public health authorities, local governments, community organizations"},{"Description":"Historic examples of 'military-like' vector control lacking community engagement","Impact":"Weakness in vector control efforts, hindering disease prevention and elimination","Mitigation":"Strengthening community engagement in vector control, especially for Aedes mosquitoes","Technologies":"Community-based vector control measures, community outreach programs","People":"Communities at risk of vector-borne diseases","Owner":"Community organizations, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Call for strengthening vector control following the Zika epidemic","Impact":"Recognition of the role of vector control in disease prevention and public health response","Mitigation":"Implementing WHO GVCR strategy to strengthen vector control","Technologies":"Vector control tools and strategies recommended by the WHO GVCR strategy","People":"Public health authorities, countries affected by vector-borne diseases","Owner":"International health organizations, public health authorities"}]}
